version_description:
Fixed a few bugs
Non-paid version can now use any picture
Added ads for non-paid version
Bug fixes

- Less Ads!
- Fixed when the buttons on the bottom did work well when the picture was underneath them.
- Some other little bug fixes
- Decided to skip 1.3.2... just because...

Minor bug fixes
Displays IAP in local currency

- Added a splash screen with an intro video
- Made it more clear that you don't need to purchase anything to use all of the app's features
- Fixed a few minor bugs

The new and improved DVE
- Adjust focus of camera
- Image Breakdown Mode
- New Interface

- New image breakdown mode... separates the image you want to draw into different shades for you to trace.
- Adjust the focus of the camera.
- Resume last drawing session
- Improved UI (Looks a lot nicer)
Fixed Step by Step Bug

Fixed in app purchase and restore purchase bug
Fixed step by step view bug
Fixed watch video bug

New Features in Classic Mode!
- Front Camera
- Pause Camera
- Grid lines
- Adjustable Strobe Speed
- Fade Strobe

Bug Fixes
- Fixed purchase and restore bug

NEW FEATURE: Lesson of the day!
Come back and learn how to draw something new every day. Step by step lessons on how to draw everything from portraits to pets. The goal of these lessons is to improve your drawing skills when you are not using the app.

New Lessons
Step By Step mode has classic mode settings
Fullscreen mode
Move button now can move the camera or the overlay image
Bug Fixes

Bug Fixes
New Main Screen
Submit your art button!

Bug fixes
Submit your art button
Pro tips
New ui

Record your drawings!
The new "Record" feature creates a video of your drawing!
Bug Fixes

UI Fixes for iPhone X
Performance Optimization

NEW!
AR Mode: No need to keep your phone steady on a stand, use AR to anchor your reference image in place
Recording: Better recording quality
Share: Share your artwork with other users
Inspire: Upload inspiration for other artists to draw, o
